Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Rodeman
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera for the price.  The onscreen programming is a pain as you can't get to the button if the camera is installed and you can't set it and work on it as you have the camera dangling and not pointed at the location you want to monitor, so I just didn't change any settings.  But overall good quality.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Raun
Reviews.Content: Was expecting more clarity out of this camera but it still does what it was bought for. Could of been cheaper

ProductInfo.Features:
700 TV lines
Vandalproof; WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)
OSD Menu
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional 700TVL 1/3 Inch Sony Exview HAD CCD II Dome Indoor Surveilance Video Security Camera - 3.6mm Lens, 36 IR LED, 98.4ft IR Distance
